body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, physician. Daviess County, Kentucky, native. Son of Samuel Pyles and Elizabeth Calhoun Pyles. Married to Cordelia Lafayette Talbot Pyles in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 1, 1847. Father of John Talbot Pyles, Madison Pyles, and Lillie R. Pyles. Graduate of the University of Louisville Medical School in 1846. Physician in Louisville from 1846 to 1866. Resident surgeon of the Marine Hospital in Louisville from 1847 to 1849. Owned four enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Attending surgeon at the Marine Hospital in Louisville in 1854. Owned five enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Trustee of the Marine Hospital in Louisville in 1861.
